long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with this interactive Pomodoro Timer, combined with a customizable alarm! Stay focused during your work sessions and set a custom alarm for any specific time, perfect for scheduled breaks, meetings, or important reminders.

Key Features:
Pomodoro Timer: Start 25-minute Pomodoro sessions to work efficiently with planned breaks.
Sound and Visual Alerts: A sound plays and the screen flashes at the end of each session to notify you.
Customizable Alarm: Set an alarm for a specific time (24-hour format) to stay organized throughout the day.
Mute/Sound Mode: Toggle sound on or off with a single click using the MUTE/SOUND button.
Simple and Intuitive Interface: Easy to use with a clean design, offering all the necessary features at your fingertips.
Flashing Window: When the alarm goes off, the window flashes and is brought to the front to ensure you don’t miss it.
Why use Pomodoro Timer with Custom Alarm?
Optimize your work sessions: Use the Pomodoro technique to stay focused and productive.
Plan your breaks: Set an alarm to schedule regular breaks or important reminders without distractions.
Convenient and unobtrusive design: The mute feature allows you to disable sounds when needed.
Enhance your efficiency today with this advanced Pomodoro Timer, perfect for work or study!
